name: PinkCore
description: PinkCore is a Core mod which aims to give you as much of a 'PC experience' as possible! This includes adding information to your game such as the Mappers names, Mod Requirements, Custom Colours, Custom Difficulty names, Burn Marks, and more!

name: Chroma
description: Chromaâ„¢ boasts the most power in color customization you've ever seen, allowing mappers to customize blocks, lights, sabers, and barriers into not just one but multiple colors!

name: Trick Saber
description: This mod allows you to perform various tricks like spinning / throwing your sabers, hence the name 'Trick Saber'

name: Trick Saber
description: This mod allows you to perform various tricks like spinning / throwing your sabers, hence the name 'Trick Saber'

name: I Forgor ðŸ’€
description: A Beat Saber mod that shows the direction of the last blocks and the angle of your sabers before you paused

name: Combo Splitter
description: Modifies the Combo panel to count a combo for each hand individually, instead of one combo for both.

name: DebrisTweaks
description: Allows for full customization of various note debris parameters. Useful for those who wish to reduce vision blocks without disabling debris completely.

name: AntiVertigo
description: Spawns a cube/cylinder under the player to help those with vertigo or a fear of heights

name: Inverted Arrows
description: This mod that reverses arrow directions for beat saber blocks. Disables score submission.

name: Inverted Arrows
description: This mod that reverses arrow directions for beat saber blocks. Disables score submission.

name: Replay
description:
This mod lets you record better videos and lets you view a replay of any of your recorded plays.
Donation Link (donators get access to a private server): https://www.patreon.com/henwill8

name: Intro Skip
description: Lets you skip sections of songs that have no notes in them.

name: Song Difficulty Chart
description: This shows a graph of the difficulty throughout a song.

name: Slice Visualizer
description: After each note cut, a visual of where on the note you hit it will show. This is good for practicing accuracy.

name: Qosmetics
description:
Gives support for using custom Saber, Wall and Block models; change models in game!
Play Your Way!

name: Custom Pillows Quest
description: Spawns pillows in the menus with user defined images

name: AikaTweaks
description: A bunch of (mostly graphical) tweaks for Beat Saber, includes things such as bloom, smoke, refresh rate, resolution, etc!

name: ImageCoverExpander
description: Beat Saber mod that expands the artwork cover of a song. This is a port of the original mod by Spooky_ and PixelBoom to the Quest platorm.

name: Custom Backgrounds
description: Import any 360 image file into Beat Saber and use it as a skybox!

name: Qounters-
description: Spice up your Beat Saber HUD with a variety of configurable Counters Qounters, which can display a wide variety of stats in an even wider variety of ways.

name: ClockMod
description: The mod will display the time and battery percentage in the game, offers various options like a toggle for 12/24 Hour format, or the super cool rainbowify toggle.

name: Custom Fail Text
description: Allows you to customize the text that appears when you fail a level.

name: RedBar
description: Allows you to change the color of your health bar according to your health.

name: RedBar
description: Allows you to change the color of your health bar according to your health.

name: QuestSounds
description: QuestSounds allows the user to change sounds, just drop them into one of the folders in /ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/QuestSounds/ and select them in-game!

name: Slogans
description: Beat Saber mod that adds some cool customisable text in the environment.

name: Streamer Tools
description: Streamer-Tools enables application to receive live information from the game, that can be used for things like the overlays on the official client.

name: Streamer Tools
description: Streamer-Tools enables application to receive live information from the game, that can be used for things like the overlays on the official client.

name: NoHealthAndSafety
description: Removes the annoying health and safety pop-up upon starting the game.

name: Third Person Mod
description: Allows you to play in third person.

name: Third Person Mod
description: Allows you to play in third person.

name: ModList
description: Lets you view a list of loaded mods ingame.

name: Discord Presence
description: Allows you to see discord rich presence from Beat Saber on discord.

name: Faster Scroll
description: Find your song faster with this customizable faster scrolling mod.

name: FishUtils
description: FishUtils is a general quality-of-life (QOL) mod that combines 3 of my mods (SlowResume, AutoDebris and PauseConfirm) into one package. I made it as I never use these mods separately, and they work best together.
